title: Visual Arts: By the end of grade 12
subject: Visual and Performing Arts (2020-)

718D89908C7C4534A9BC09C961995231.description: Assess the impact of an artist or group of artists on global issues, including climate change.

35CAA9E41626481D9E3B1818BC9CAAF7.description: Assess the impact of an artist or group of artists on beliefs, values, and behaviors of a society

852C967A86674CC1BF7801522C574B4E.description: Compare uses of art in a variety of societal, cultural and historical contexts and make connections to global issues, including climate change

194430EFD4F84B1A990E1CC4A9179447.description:
Compare uses of art in a variety of societal, cultural and historical contexts and
make connections to uses of art in contemporary and local contexts.

4679E5CA673C4C08BBFD51F14BCE4F0F.description: Describe how knowledge of global issues, including climate change, may influence personal responses to art

90AD7728E74841E5ACAD2CE5FAC5BE2C.description:
Describe how knowledge of culture, traditions and history may influence personal
responses to art.

298C8D4297024F25A4FB6075D6EA94BC.description: Relating artistic ideas and works within societal, cultural and historical contexts to deepen understanding.

06D51E4BCA4C4DDB86EF5D489BF483B8.description: Synthesize knowledge of social, cultural, historical, and personal life with art- making approaches to create meaningful works of art or design.

C9711D6E533F43CBBD3DC6FF116E0186.description: Utilize inquiry methods of observation, research and experimentation to explore other subjects through artmaking

BDB65E17A0344B19A32CBC7CFD7B7A94.description: Document the process of developing ideas from early stages to fully elaborated ideas.

145CD84569AB4A2E9A97E47FE6B16D25.description: Synthesizing and relating knowledge and personal experiences to create products.

0DE0734307DC425DB95EF6576881176B.description: Construct evaluations of a work of art or collection of works based on differing sets of criteria.

454751CE7DC94B9A8A5B7D642ACCBC2B.description: Determine the relevance of criteria used by others to evaluate a work of art or collection of works.

52D865B19DE948F1A68127E2364CD670.description: Establish relevant criteria in order to evaluate a work of art or collection of works.

91BCA8779DD44A96BFB3CDBCDCD6D334.description:
Analyze differing interpretations of an artwork or collection of works in order to
 select and defend a plausible critical analysis.

44565EFEF4E0414499800B4F107258D3.description:
Identify types of contextual information useful in the process of constructing
 interpretations of an artwork or collection of works.

484D793EB7BC47B08AF1AF0DA2BFC129.description: Interpret an artwork or collection of works, supported by relevant and sufficient evidence found in the work and its various contexts.

E2C14A69B92142E98EEC571A79EBB1C7.description: Determine the commonalities within a group of artists or visual arts attributed to a particular type of art, timeframe, or culture

BB966622920D48D09595E99587AB6624.description:
Analyze how responses to art develop over time based on knowledge of and
 experience with art and life.

B706D2FECF3E4FA0984594335FA4BBD9.description:
Evaluate the effectiveness of visual artworks to influence ideas, feelings, and
 behaviors of specific audiences.

6B76C38541D046B7BB0547403CAF50DE.description:
Recognize and describe personal aesthetic and empathetic responses to the natural
 world and constructed environments.

392D38FD2CDE46E1B04446D106A78F4B.description:
Analyze how one's understanding of the world is affected by experiencing visual
arts.

2F969E19FD9C46A88EF25FD64A8DF18A.description:
Hypothesize ways in which art influences perception and understanding of human
experiences.

A5A667191F89458B9CCE671FD8281A55.description: Curate a collection of objects, artifacts or artwork to impact the viewer's understanding of social, cultural and/or political experiences.

CBE97A0A5DE24CB2BB6B93001B43DA39.description:
Make, explain and justify connections between artists or artwork and social, cultural
 and political history.

F6091DC3D8AF4C55BEA75E3E5FF84F1E.description:
Analyze and describe the impact that an exhibition or collection has on personal
 awareness of social, cultural or political beliefs and understandings

15174133DEB64FAB997190BA3123884D.description: Investigate, compare and contrast methods for preserving and protecting art.

479D9C776DC1497EADF88C0E2E070B07.description: Evaluate, select and apply methods or processes appropriate to display artwork in specific place

5BEB77854D83471CAC0C18DB079331B1.description: Analyze and evaluate the reasons and ways an exhibition is presented.

2DB83A48216143ADAD8FB954B84BBB57.description: Developing and refining techniques and models or steps needed to create products.

5062B334F46147F7B05C436550543A2A.description: Critique, justify and present choices in the process of analyzing, selecting, curating, and presenting artwork for a specific exhibit or event.

BB7C50E57DF54C65BC9541F15AA9049D.description: Analyze, select and critique personal artwork for a collection or portfolio presentation.

A24999CE8DE44838BD70FA0C54000452.description: Analyze, select and curate artifacts and/or artworks for presentation and preservation.

17F4E8962CB94FD2B905EB7425093703.description: Reflect on, re-engage, revise and refine works of art or design considering relevant traditional and contemporary criteria as well as personal artistic vision.

BCD86065586642D0A5FA1E6651E422C1.description: Engage in constructive critique with peers, then reflect on, re- engage, revise, and refine works of art and design in response to personal artistic vision.

26A88423D7C641168E201274EB18B16F.description: Apply relevant criteria from traditional and contemporary cultural contexts to examine, reflect on and plan revisions for works of art and design in progress.

AA69216AB28548DDB40AE7E20F2A2BB4.description: Demonstrate in works of art or design how visual and material culture defines, shapes, enhances, inhibits, and/or empowers peoples' lives

E822491D00274FE5BBEB8527FC64BC2C.description:
Demonstrate understanding of the importance of balancing freedom and
 responsibility in the use of images, materials, tools and equipment in the creation and circulation of
 creative work.

D2421A8F81A34107A9D5063405747FEC.description:
Experiment, plan and make multiple works of art and design that explore a
 personally meaningful theme, idea, or concept.

795401B0E44747E5869F103CCBAACCBE.description: Redesign an object, system, place, or design in response to contemporary issues.

91B42886BFE046B8B2FDB71BB48C845B.description: Demonstrate awareness of ethical implications of making and distributing creative work.

161893A33A7E4674BC0B9FA14DF2227F.description:
Through experimentation, practice and persistence, demonstrate acquisition of skills
 and knowledge in a chosen art form.

557CDBA8C91F47049315199099DF4C61.description:
Collaboratively develop a proposal for an installation, artwork, or space design that
 transforms the perception and experience of a particular place.

207BFCD2792F49BC973FADBBE444836B.description:
Explain how traditional and non-traditional materials may impact human health and
 the environment, and demonstrate safe handling of materials, tools and equipment.

F548F5E7C7BD4A85AA723FC3597D800F.description: Engage in making a work of art or design without having a preconceived plan.

86B4F2368C064589A8F777D5D643FD4C.description: Choose from a range of materials and methods of traditional and contemporary artistic practices, following or breaking established conventions, to plan the making of multiple works of art and design based on a theme, idea or concept.

BC4C13B90A5B4C989FB11593B1666E21.description: Visualize and generate art and design that can affect social change.

9B75D413F44F4DFFB194F1AF71AF6700.description:
Choose from a range of materials and methods of traditional and contemporary
 artistic practices to plan works of art and design.

A373962F24FA41B2AC92E0F171FAC375.description:
Individually and collaboratively formulate new creative problems based on student’s
existing artwork.

CA8A702BF6A44E66B5315982B3A14A52.description:
Shape an artistic investigation of an aspect of present-day life using a contemporary
 practice of art and design.

DC4F42B438A144EA8E48BC45C9C37515.description: Use multiple approaches to begin creative endeavors.
